mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ENTP_NAME, BAR_CODE, UD_DOC_ID, STORAGE_METHOD, VALID_TERM, EDI_CODE, WARNING_TEXT, NO_INJECT, CAUTION_INJECT, ALLERGY_REACTION, GENERAL_CAUTION, MULTIE_INJECT_WARNING, PREGNANT_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, LACTIATION_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, CHILD_INJECT_WARNING, OLDMAN_INJECT_WARNING, PREGNANT_WOMEN_WITH_LACTIATION_WOMEN_WARNING, OVERDOSE_TREATMENT, DOSE_CAUTION, BEFORE_CONSULT_DOCTOR, AFTER_CONSULT_DOCTOR, INTERACTION_CAUTION, EXTRA_CAUTION FROM drugPrdtPrmsnDtlInq
mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into drugPrdtPrmsnDtlInq ( ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ENTP_NAME, BAR_CODE, UD_DOC_ID, STORAGE_METHOD, VALID_TERM, EDI_CODE, WARNING_TEXT, NO_INJECT, CAUTION_INJECT, ALLERGY_REACTION, GENERAL_CAUTION, MULTIE_INJECT_WARNING, PREGNANT_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, LACTIATION_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, CHILD_INJECT_WARNING, OLDMAN_INJECT_WARNING, PREGNANT_WOMEN_WITH_LACTIATION_WOMEN_WARNING, OVERDOSE_TREATMENT, DOSE_CAUTION, BEFORE_CONSULT_DOCTOR, AFTER_CONSULT_DOCTOR, INTERACTION_CAUTION, EXTRA_CAUTION ) values ( #{ITEM_SEQ}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ENTP_NAME}, #{BAR_CODE}, #{UD_DOC_ID}, #{STORAGE_METHOD}, #{VALID_TERM}, #{EDI_CODE}, #{WARNING_TEXT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NO_INJECT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CAUTION_INJECT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ALLERGY_REACTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{GENERAL_CAUTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MULTIE_INJECT_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PREGNANT_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LACTIATION_WOMEN_INJECT_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHILD_INJECT_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OLDMAN_INJECT_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PREGNANT_WOMEN_WITH_LACTIATION_WOMEN_WARNING, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OVERDOSE_TREATMENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOSE_CAUTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BEFORE_CONSULT_DOCTOR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AFTER_CONSULT_DOCTOR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INTERACTION_CAUTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXTRA_CAUTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
